message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the product for $13,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,500 is quite a bit lower than I can accept. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I'm getting close to your price, but I still think $10,500 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer.
